task.title: Adjust the lighting levels
task.shortdesc: Lighting levels can be individually configured based on preferences.

context.p: In some cases the pilot or other administrator of the system may override your personal lighting preferences due to safety or other factors.
The administrator of the system has the ability to override any personal preferences. In most cases this is defaulted to the pilot, but a passenger can also be promoted to an administrator.

step.cmd: Launch your personal Primary Control dialog.

info.p: As the administrator, if you tap Override all Layouts you can set global lighting for all seat positions.

step.cmd: Tap the appropriate light level or configuration.

result.p: The lighting in your pod adjust based on your preferences.
